rows.label: qev087502_MSG0001
rows.name: Cooooool...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0001_2
rows.name: Is this a backpack beam cannon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0002
rows.name: Prototype for one, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oooh... They really crammed the
high-output ion capacitors in there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0004
rows.name:
Not bad, eh?
That baby can go a month without needing a recharge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0005
rows.name: Huh? That's dumb, you're wasting all its potential.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0006
rows.name: Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0007
rows.name: No, it's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0008
rows.name: What would you suggest, Lin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0009
rows.name: I'd channel that energy into fewer, more powerful bursts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0010
rows.name: Why the hell would you need more punch than this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0011
rows.name:
Because if you push it up another 800 gigs,
it'll cut right through the beam coating on Ganglion armor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0012
rows.name: Sure, but think of the heat something like that would put out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0013
rows.name:
Well yeah, you'd just need to change the
conductor material for the barrel jacket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0014
rows.name: The barrel jacket, huh? Interesting...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0015
rows.name: Is all this even feasible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0016
rows.name:
There'd be a few hurdles, sure...
but if we can clear those, it could be big.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0017
rows.name: We'll just have to try it out and see, won't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0018
rows.name: Yeah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0019
rows.name:
Let's see...
I can think of two other problems right off the bat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0020
rows.name:
Why don't we have you sort this out
with the engineers here, Alan and Brenna.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0021
rows.name: Talk to them, they might have ideas for a work-around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087502_MSG0022
rows.name: Yes, sir![ST:wait ]
